ExtlRecShrPicklistMap.name: ExtlRecShrPicklistMap
ExtlRecShrPicklistMap.description: Represents the external record share picklist field mapping between the partner and vendor system for Partner Connect.

ImportedPcklstOptionId.description: ID of the external record share picklist option of the external system.

InternalPcklstOptionId.description: ID of the external record share picklist option of the internal system.

ExtlRecShrPicklistMap.accessRules: To see this object, enable Partner Connect or Partner Connect for Vendors. See Set Up Partner Connect as a Partner and Set Up Partner Connect as a Vendor in Salesforce Help.
